Colors compare problem

During my Colorific development I found a problem - how to recognize that colors are similar. I've searched stack overflow and found some few algorythms which were useful but were not too helpful.

The very first idea was to measure distance in 3D (r,g,b) space between 2 colors: $$ \sqrt{(R2 - R1){2} + (G2-G1){2} + (B2 - B1){2}} $$

Drawbacks * No alpha support * drawback 2 * drawback 3
